column2: Brilliant
This character is sharper than the average individual.
Smart
Much smarter than the average person.
Bright
Quickly understands and overcomes mental challenges.
Dim
Not the brightest tool in the shed.
Dumb
Some consider this character to be borderline retarded.
Idiot
Although ostensibly sentient, this character seems to not understand even basic concepts.
Tough
This character shakes off wounds with a mere shrug.
Hardy
This character is hardy and resistant to illness.
Soft
This character is not the type suited for blood and glory.
Fragile
Weak and sensitive.
Pretty
This character is pleasing to the eye.
Plain
This character has a very ordinary, unremarkable face. So much so that it's hard to describe what they look like.
Unsightly
This character is hardly pleasing to the eye.
This child resembles its family - but the subtle differences will determine how others respond to [GetHerHis] appearance.
One can only hope for the best.
As this child begins to feed and grow, you begin to see indications of [GetHerHis] future physical strength and stamina.
May [GetSheHe] become as fit and vigorous as the heroes of old!
As this child interacts with the world, you learn whether or not [GetSheHe] takes after [GetHerHis] parents in mental ability.
Pray [GetSheHe] has learned from [GetHerHis] family even while in the womb.
Melodious
This character has a voice like an angel.
Fluent
This character has a clear and coherent voice.
Resilient
This character is especially resistant to illness.
Psychopath
This character is predisposed to antisocial and violent behaviour.
Frugal
This character dislikes spending their wealth.
Romantic
This character is a hopeless romantic constantly seeking love, often in the worst places.

One of your servants asked you today if he could leave to visit his dying mother before she passed. You refused, showing little concern for his pitiful issues. It seems your troubled childhood has affected your ability to empathize with others.
You are a Psychopath.
